Title: Relates to directing the superintendent of the New York state police to prepare a visor card for the hard of hearing
Summary: Directs the superintendent of the New York State Police to prepare a visor card for the deaf or hard of hearing to enable police to respond to traffic stops involving the deaf or hard of hearing and avoid conflict and escalation because of difficulty communicating.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to directing the superintendent of the New York state police to prepare informational material to aid police during interactions with persons who are deaf or hard of hearing
